data.title: Pinkos Bialystok Names Index
data.text:

PINKOS BIALYSTOK

Volume I

Index of People (Surnames)

Pages 465-477

Those interested in contributing funds to this Yizkor Book project can identify the Chapter and/or Section to apply your donation.

To contribute to the Pinkos Bialystok Yizkor Book Project, click here.

a) Enter the amount of your contribution next to Bialystok Yizkor Book

b) To apply your donation to a specific Chapter or Section or to fully fund a Chapter of Section, send an email to

Mark Halpern, BIALYGen Coordinator, identifying the Volume, Chapter, and Section you wish to translate.

GO TO MAIN PINKOS BIALYSTOK PAGE

GO TO VOLUME II NAMES INDEX

GO TO JEWISHGEN YIZKOR BOOK PROJECT

TRANSLATION FROM YIDDISH

pp. 465-477

Donated by BIALYGen, Mark Halpern (Coordinator), USA

Translated by Michael Goldstein, Israel

The following is a transliteration of the Yiddish names index from Volume I of Pinkos Bialystok.

For more information about this book, click here.

As a result of the differences in spelling between the use of the Latin (English) alphabet

and the Hebrew (Yiddish) alphabet, you should look through this entire list to find your Surnames.

You can refer to the original Yiddish text for clarification, which can be viewed here.
